attributes.action: Life in prison should be life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who kill another person or more get given a life sentence which is a minimum of 15yrs or less for good behavour, What justice do we get for loosing a member of our family/friends by that criminal being released in a couple of years and having luxurys for their crime. prisons is no longer a punishment i believe the americans have the right idea by having an extremely hard prison which people will not look forward to being sent to and will be punished. like they deserve for the repeated crimes they commit. Lets have criminals think before they commit and think life will be life and prison time will be hard.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
